Topic.Title: Is it possible to move a game file to Quest from web

Posts.EditableText: Well, it is? for i want to add a libary to it but it is on the web.
Posts.HTML: Well, it is? for i want to add a libary to it but it is on the web.

Posts.EditableText: Yes. Go to this page: http://textadventures.co.uk/create Find the game you want and click the 'Download' button. Just keep in mind that you can't upload it back to the online version for editing.
Posts.HTML:
Yes. Go to this page: http://textadventures.co.uk/create
Find the game you want and click the 'Download' button.

Just keep in mind that you can't upload it back to the online version for editing.
